system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: After resolving this attack, the user increases its default SPATK and SPDEF by +1.
Requirement: [Primarina] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Sparkling Aria on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Oceanic Operetta
